review: easy to set up and use.well worth the investment
author: Patrick L. Hodges

review: Does not have everything you can get with Roku.  Needs better coverage of content
author: Kevin Janssen

review: Great content, which is why I bought it. Very robust interface, unlike similar devices. Easy to use and set up.
author: Mark Trezise

review: I love watching Netflix on my tv instead of my iPad, but nothing is free here. You have to buy/subscribe to get anything cool. Kind of a bummer.
author: 4SocialImprovementNow

review: Haven't had a lot of time to use this product, but what time I have spent with it...it has met my expectations.  I wish it came preloaded with more apps, also a longer USB extender as it seems to need to be clear of the TV to get the best signal.  For the price, well worth the purchase.
author: Gary S West

review: Great product, the whole family loves it.
author: Rhonda Nelson

review: The whole thing was un clear.... I was under the impression that it was sort of a "memory stick", that once you picked what to view, it would go to the stick and not stream the whole entire time.  Ate up my 15G of internet in 3 episodes of Game of Thrones and I went over my limit.  Cost me 50$ in fees.
author: Tammy Bartlett "Tammy Bartlett"
